short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Define or pronounce words using Google search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple tool for people that want to improve their English that allows them to quickly define a word or see its pronunciation using Google's search. It's recommended to add a keyboard shortcut for the extension to speed up the process even further.
